36 template<class ModelInterface>
37 ModelInterface* TMultiModelObserverBase<ModelInterface>::GetObjectPtr(int objectIndex) const
38 {
39  Q_ASSERT(objectIndex >= 0);
40  Q_ASSERT(objectIndex < GetModelCount());
41 
42  return dynamic_cast<ModelInterface*>(GetModelPtr(objectIndex));
43 }
44 
45 
46 // reimplemented (imod::IObserver)
47 
48 template<class ModelInterface>
49 bool TMultiModelObserverBase<ModelInterface>::OnAttached(imod::IModel* modelPtr)
50 {
51  ModelInterface* objectPtr = dynamic_cast<ModelInterface*>(modelPtr);
52  if (objectPtr == NULL){
53  return false;
54  }
55 
56  return BaseClass::OnAttached(modelPtr);
57 }

imod::TMultiModelObserverBase::OnAttached
virtual bool OnAttached(imod::IModel *modelPtr)
This call back function will be called, if an observable object is about to be attached.
